title: Table of Contents Block Theme Configuration
description: Complete theme and appearance configuration for Table of Contents blocks

groups.title: External Borders
groups.description: TOC wrapper borders, radius, and shadows

groups.title: Link Colors
groups.description: Colors for TOC links (all text in TOC is a link)

tocId.label: TOC ID
tocId.description: Unique identifier for the table of contents

titleText.label: Title Text
titleText.description: The title displayed above the table of contents

tocItems.label: Curated TOC Items
tocItems.description: Persisted TOC entries with anchors and levels

deletedHeadingIds.label: Deleted Heading IDs
deletedHeadingIds.description: Anchors removed from scans until reset

includeLevels.label: Include Heading Levels
includeLevels.description: Which heading levels to include (H1-H6) - derived from includeH1-H6 toggles

includeClasses.label: Include Classes
includeClasses.description: CSS classes to include in TOC

excludeClasses.label: Exclude Classes
excludeClasses.description: CSS classes to exclude from TOC

includeAccordions.label: Include Accordion Headings
includeAccordions.description: Include headings from accordion blocks when they have a heading level set

includeTabs.label: Include Tab Headings
includeTabs.description: Include headings from tabs blocks when they have a heading level set

isCollapsible.label: Collapsible
isCollapsible.description: Allow the TOC to be collapsed/expanded

scrollOffset.label: Scroll Offset
scrollOffset.description: Offset in pixels when scrolling to heading

clickBehavior.label: Click Behavior
clickBehavior.description: What happens when clicking a TOC item

tocHorizontalAlign.label: Block Horizontal Alignment
tocHorizontalAlign.description: Horizontal alignment of the TOC block

wrapperBackgroundColor.label: Block Background
wrapperBackgroundColor.description: Background color of the TOC wrapper

blockBorderColor.label: Block Border Color
blockBorderColor.description: Border color of the TOC wrapper

unifiedLinkColors.label: Same Colors for All Levels
unifiedLinkColors.description: Use the same link colors for all heading levels

h1FontSize.label: H1 Font Size
h1FontSize.description: Font size for H1 headings in rem

h2FontSize.label: H2 Font Size
h2FontSize.description: Font size for H2 headings in rem

h3FontSize.label: H3 Font Size
h3FontSize.description: Font size for H3 headings in rem

h4FontSize.label: H4 Font Size
h4FontSize.description: Font size for H4 headings in rem

h5FontSize.label: H5 Font Size
h5FontSize.description: Font size for H5 headings in rem

h6FontSize.label: H6 Font Size
h6FontSize.description: Font size for H6 headings in rem

useDifferentIcons.label: Different Icons for Open/Close
useDifferentIcons.description: Use different icons for active and inactive states

iconPosition.label: Icon Position
iconPosition.description: Position of the icon relative to title

iconRotation.label: Animation Rotation
iconRotation.description: Rotation angle applied during open/close transition

titleFontSize.label: Header Font Size
titleFontSize.description: Font size for the TOC header in rem

titleFontWeight.label: Header Font Weight
titleFontWeight.description: Font weight for the TOC header

blockBorderWidth.label: Block Border Width
blockBorderWidth.description: Width of the wrapper border in pixels

blockShadowHover.label: Block Hover Shadow
blockShadowHover.description: CSS box-shadow for the wrapper on hover

enableHierarchicalIndent.label: Enable Hierarchical Indentation
enableHierarchicalIndent.description: Indent headings based on document hierarchy (e.g., H3 under H2 indents once)

levelIndent.label: Indentation Amount
levelIndent.description: Amount to indent each nested level

positionHorizontalSide.label: Horizontal Side
positionHorizontalSide.description: Which side to anchor the TOC (sticky/fixed positioning)
